```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Source necessary scripts
source("scripts/install_and_import.R")  
source("scripts/import_data.R")          
source("scripts/analyze_data.R")          
source("scripts/visualize.R")  

# Load your data
data_business <- import_data()  # Call the import function 

# Analyze data
analysis_results <- analyze_data(data_business)

# Display star summary
knitr::kable(analysis_results$star_summary, caption = "Summary of Star Ratings")

# Display review count summary
knitr::kable(analysis_results$review_summary, caption = "Summary of Review Counts");

# Display top true attributes
knitr::kable(analysis_results$top_true_attributes, 
             caption = "Count of Top 30 Attributes (True)", 
             format = "markdown");

# Display top false attributes
knitr::kable(analysis_results$top_false_attributes, 
             caption = "Count of Top 30 Attributes (False)", 
             format = "markdown");

# Create visualizations
visualizations <- create_visualizations(data_business)

# Plot for star ratings
print(visualizations$star_plot)

# Plot for state distribution
print(visualizations$state_plot)

# Plot for category distribution
print(visualizations$category_plot)
```
